Modifiers.name: Inverter
Modifiers.description: Inverts the result of the child node

Modifiers.name: Repeat Until Failure
Modifiers.description: Repeats until the child node fails

Modifiers.name: Repeat Until Success
Modifiers.description: Repeats until the child node succeeds

Modifiers.name: Loop
Modifiers.description: Loops the child node a given amount of times

Tasks.name: Run Node
Tasks.description: Runs the given node, which can be any node

Tasks.name: Talk
Tasks.description: Talks to the target given as parameter

Tasks.name: Attack
Tasks.description: Attacks the target given as parameter

Tasks.name: MoveTo
Tasks.description: Moves the agent to the target

Tasks.name: IsDoorOpened
Tasks.description: Inspects a door to see if it is opened or not visually

Tasks.name: CheckEntitiesInView
Tasks.description: Checks the entities in the agent's view. Returns a list of entities visible

Tasks.name: MoveToNextWaypoint
Tasks.description: Moves the agent to the next waypoint. Returns false when there are no more waypoints

Tasks.name: FindObjectInRoom
Tasks.description: Finds an object in the room

Tasks.name: PlayAnimation
Tasks.description: Plays the animation given as parameter, with the given loop and speed

Tasks.name: Wait
Tasks.description: Waits for a given amount of seconds

Tasks.name: SetTarget
Tasks.description: Sets the target to the given target

Tasks.name: SetDestination
Tasks.description: Sets the destination to the given target

Tasks.name: SetSpeed
Tasks.description: Sets the speed to the given value

Tasks.name: SetRotation
Tasks.description: Sets the rotation to the given value

Composites.name: Sequence
Composites.description: Execute branches in order until one fails or all succeed

Composites.name: Selector
Composites.description: Execute branches in order until one succeeds or all fail

Composites.name: Conditional Branch
Composites.description: Chooses one branch depending if the condition is true or false

children.name: True
children.description: Branch to follow if the condition is true

children.name: False
children.description: Branch to follow if the condition is false

Conditionals.name: IsTargetInRange
Conditionals.description: Checks if the target is in range

Conditionals.name: IsTargetVisible
Conditionals.description: Checks if the target is visible

Conditionals.name: IsTargetAlive
Conditionals.description: Checks if the target is alive

Conditionals.name: IsDoorOpened
Conditionals.description: Checks if the door is opened

Conditionals.name: IsTargetNeutral
Conditionals.description: Checks if the target is neutral

Conditionals.name: IsTargetMoving
Conditionals.description: Checks if the target is moving

Conditionals.name: IsTargetStationary
Conditionals.description: Checks if the target is stationary

Conditionals.name: IsTargetAttacking
Conditionals.description: Checks if the target is attacking

Conditionals.name: IsTargetDefending
Conditionals.description: Checks if the target is defending

Conditionals.name: IsTargetCasting
Conditionals.description: Checks if the target is casting

Conditionals.name: IsTargetStunned
Conditionals.description: Checks if the target is stunned
